word: The eye of God is upon these scattered ones. If there are only two or three of you together, the promise is, Where two or three are met together in My name, there am I in the midst of them. And what does the Lord say in regard to these little companies? Why, He says, "They shall be mine in that day when I make up My jewels, and I will spare them as a man spareth his own son that serveth him."
